Name: Lost In 80s II
About the game: Lost in 80s II blends a arcade game style with the best of the eighties culture. With different and challenging levels, our character will have to be fast, avoiding and defeating various kinds of enemies and, to make it even better, running from a wall full of spikes. Lost In 80s II brings back all the characteristics and style that made it first version unforgettable. And now, coming with a better gameplay, making the game even more fun. Another features: - Characters with characteristic clothes, party globes, juckeboxes and much more. - Sound effects and music inspired in 80s. - 30 levels of pure challenge and fun.
